trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectorySchemaClass class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectorySchemaClass 클래스에는 스키마 파티션에 포함 된 스키마 클래스 정을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A>를 커밋하기 위해 메서드를 호출 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass>내부 디렉터리 저장소에 만들어진 개체는.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> 이 대 한 컨텍스트를 지정 하는 개체 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>이 대 한 LDAP 표시 이름을 나타내는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: context유효한를 참조 하지 않는 또는 , ldapDisplayName 은 빈 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: context or ldapDisplayName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor ldapDisplayName is .

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> </xref> 개체의 보조 클래스를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> </xref> 개체가 있는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 현재 스키마 클래스 개체의 보조 클래스를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: CN (일반 이름)을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the CN of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>현재 클래스 개체의 CN을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> descriptor of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> 의 설명자는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> 현재 스키마 클래스 개체에 대 한 기본 보안 설명자를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 설명을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a description of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>현재 클래스 개체에 대 한 설명을 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체 및 필요에 따라 릴리스 관리 되지 않는 리소스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the managed resources should be released; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 리소스를 해제; 한 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 지정 된 디렉터리 컨텍스트 및 이름과 일치 하는 Active Directory 도메인 서비스 스키마 파티션에 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> 검색에 대 한 컨텍스트를 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>검색에 대 한 스키마 클래스의 LDAP 표시 이름을 지정 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object for the schema class that was found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 발견 된 스키마 클래스에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the class was not found.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 클래스를 찾을 수 없는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: 개체를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: context유효한를 참조 하지 않는 또는 , ldapDisplayName 은 빈 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션의 부모 속성을 포함 하는 모든 속성을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 메서드는 언바운드 개체 인스턴스에서 비어 있는 경우 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection>컬렉션이 반환 됩니다.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of the properties of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref>, including ancestor properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> </xref> 의 속성 컬렉션에서 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref>, 부모 속성 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> 개체에 대 한는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체가 존재 하는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>개체가 존재 하지 않는; 이면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: 현재 모든 변경 내용을 커밋합니다 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체 내부 디렉터리 저장소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The context is an AD LDS configuration set and the AD LDS instance could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 컨텍스트는 AD LDS 구성 집합 및 AD LDS 인스턴스를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: schemaIDGUID를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 항목 "schemaIDGUID" 또는 "스키마 ID GUID" MSDN library에서 [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: SchemaGuid "확장된 권한"을 관리 하는 등 여러 가지 Active Directory 도메인 서비스 구성 작업에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>개체의 schemaIDGUID를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 항목 "schemaIDGUID" 또는 "스키마 ID GUID" MSDN library에서 [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is derived.
trans-unit.target: 스키마 클래스를 가져오거나 현재 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체에서 파생 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 현재 스키마 클래스가 파생 되는 스키마 클래스를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>현재 클래스를 만드는 동안 지정 된 스키마 클래스가 없으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 기본 디렉터리 서비스에 대 한 호출에서 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 대상 서버를 사용 중이거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 표시 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>의 LDAP 표시 이름을 나타내는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> type for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> </xref> 에 대 한 입력은 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> value that contains the type of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> </xref> 현재의 유형을 포함 하는 값 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> value (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 형식이 유효한 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> </xref> 값 (설정 작업에 적용 됨).
